# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.0 FATAL_ERROR)
SET(VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR "/usr/gapps/visit/2.4.1/linux-x86_64/include")
SET(VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR "/usr/gapps/visit/2.4.1/linux-x86_64/lib")
SET(VISIT_BINARY_DIR "/usr/gapps/visit/2.4.1/linux-x86_64/bin")
SET(VISIT_ARCHIVE_DIR "/usr/gapps/visit/2.4.1/linux-x86_64/archives")
SET(VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR "/g/g0/rcook/.visit/2.4.1/linux-x86_64/plugins")
INCLUDE("/usr/gapps/visit/2.4.1/linux-x86_64/include/PluginVsInstall.cmake")
INCLUDE("/usr/gapps/visit/2.4.1/linux-x86_64/include/VisItLibraryDependencies.cmake")

PROJECT(WPPImage)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
WPPImagePluginInfo.C
WPPImageCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
WPPImagePluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
WPPImageMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtWPPImageFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
WPPImageEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtWPPImageFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
)


LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IWPPImageDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IWPPImageDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IWPPImageDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MWPPImageDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MWPPImageDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MWPPImageDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MWPPImageDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EWPPImageDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EWPPImageDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EWPPImageDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EWPPImageDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EWPPImageDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EWPPImageDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EWPPImageDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EWPPImageDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_PREFIX(${INSTALLTARGETS})
